channel.title: I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)" - Need up to 2

item.title: Re: I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)
item.content:encoded:
Here is my rate (I have a total of 100 Ash-Covered Tiles):
2 Ash-Covered Rune = 10 Ash-Covered Tiles
Ninja Dog = 10 Ash-Covered Tiles
Super Potion = 15 Ash-Covered Tiles
Ninja Puppet/Giant Fan = 15 Ash-Covered Tiles
Crystal Lens/Gold Coin/Small Ruby = 15 Ash-Covered Tiles
Small Diamond = 25 Ash-Covered Tiles
PHSR = 50 Ash-Covered Tiles

item.title: Re: I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)
item.content:encoded: i have ash covered tile if you wanna trade for them just pm me in game with an offer of how many tiles and what you have to trade

item.title: Re: I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)
item.content:encoded:
Have you even bothered to try looking? http://bvs.wikidot.com/missions#Outskirts

EDIT: Oh and their not tradeable.

item.title: I need a Steel Tile (or at least an easy way to get one)
item.content:encoded:
Basicly I need a Steel Tile, or 2 if you have em. Tell me what you need that's reasonable and I'll see what I can do.

Alternately if you know an easy way to get one, perhaps the name of a mission that tends to drop them and the info leads me to a tile then I'd trade for that info as well. I read the forums so it's gota be info better then what the forums provide.
